overview: Upon graduation from high school eight teens take a seaplane trip, intending to celebrate on Keith's parents' private island. Stormy weather causes the plane to crash and they end up on a deserted isle. They find evidence of other visitors, and soon must fend for their lives against drug smugglers.
tagline: They were on the most exciting adventure of their lives. It would end up ... Out of Control.
title: Out of Control
